thread.section_title: Play-Asia.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Play-Asia.com | www.play-asia.com | 7 of 305
thread.title: Hyun Kye

author: Hyun Kye
title: Hyun Kye
text:
Had a hick-up with them once cuz they couldn't trust my money after accepting it for nearly what...
over 80,000 yen?
Said they will call to verify within minutes... but never did. Then accused me of providing false phone number.
Turns out they just didn't know how to make international phone calls to certain countries "properly".
Incompetent... whoever these CSRs were.
But since that... "misunderstanding" has been all sorted out, they've been providing me one of the cheapest / fastest
services for digital iTunes Japan card. :)
Pleasure doing business and wish you would continue your great work! ...minus the "hiccups".
